seriesStmt.title: Gregor Joseph Werner: A thematic catalogue of his works

annot.p: This work has been attributed to (Gregor Joseph) Werner (sources in A-A, A-EF, A-GR, A-KRB, A-RAN, A-SEI, and A-Wn; see below), Jakob Pernecker (A-LIm MusHs 681, RISM 1001101487; A-TAI 22, RISM 605017039; A-Sd A 1679, RISM 659002490; A-MS 329, RISM 600054991), Johann Baptist Schiedermayr (A-RAN 31, RISM 605000988), or Anonymous (A-GE I 302, RISM 601000677; D-NATk NA/SP (A-21), RISM 455039733). Due to its compositional technique, Werner’s authorship can be ruled out with certainty.

titlePage.label: [wrapper]
titlePage.p: Lytaniae | a | Canto, Alto, | Tenore, Basso | Violino primo | Violino secundo | Clarinetto primo | Clarinetto secundo | Tympano | Organo | Violone et Trombone | Authore J. Werner. | Karl Artberger. | 14.1.1832.

annot.p: S solo and coro, A solo and coro, T solo and coro, B solo and coro, cl 1, cl 2, clno 1, clno 2, timp, vl 1, vl 2, vlne, org

annot.p: S solo and coro, A solo and coro, T solo and coro, B solo and coro, cl 1, cl 2, clno 1, clno 2, trb, vl 1, vl 2, vlne, org

titlePage.p: Litanai [!] | a. | Soprano, Alto, Tenore et Basso | Violino Primo et Secundo Flauto | Clarinetto 1mo Clarinetto 2do in C | Clarino 1mo Clarino 2do et Cornu | 1mo 2do | Tympano com [!] Organo | v. Werne

annot.p: S coro (2x; 4, 4), A coro (3), T coro (3), B coro (4), fl (3), cl 1 (4), cl 2 (3), cor 1/2 (2), clno 1 (2), clno 2 (2), timp (2), vl 1 (4), vl 2 (4), org (7)

titlePage.p: Lytanei | a | Canto, Alto, Tenor, Basso | Violino 1mo & 2d o | Clarinetto 1m o & 2d o | Tympano | Con | Organo | Werner & Riessner

annot.p: S coro (3), A coro (2), T coro (2), B coro (2), cl 1 (2), cl 2 (2), cor 1 (2), cor 2 (2), timp (2), vl 1 (3), vl 2 (3), org (2x; 3, 8)

titlePage.label: [wrapper]
titlePage.p: Lytanei in C. | für | 4 Singstimmen | 2 Violinen | 2 Clarinetten | 2 Trompeten und Pauken | Violon und Orgel. | von Werner. | M Hirschmann [manu propria] 1848.

annot.p: S solo and coro (5), A solo and coro (3), T solo and coro (3), B solo and coro (4), cl 1 (2), cl 2 (2), clno 1 (2), clno 2 (2), timp (2), vl 1 (5), vl 2 (4), vlne (4), org (5)

titlePage.label: [wrapper]
titlePage.p: Lytaniæ Ex C. | a | Canto, Alto, | Tenore, Baſso. | Violino, Primo. | Violino, Secundo. | Clarinetto, Primo. | Clarinetto, Secundo. | Clarino, Primo. | Clarinom Secundo. | Tympano | con | Organo. | Del Sigre: Authore | Werner. [by later hand.] Gregorius] | [by first hand:] Ex Rebus | Joh Gruber [manu propria]

annot.p: The wrapper lists Werner as composer of a litany with a scoring matching that of the present work. However, it contains a litany by Antonín Mašát with different scoring (equal to A-WIL 33, RISM 600077510). Therefore, it is likely that the wrapper has been mixed up at a later date, and its original contents have been lost.

titlePage.label: [wrapper]
titlePage.p: LITANEY ex C | Canto, Alto, Tenore, Baſso. | Violino Imo et IIdo. | Clarinetto Duo. | Clarini Duo. | Tympano | e | Organo | Del Signore Werner | [different hand] erhalten ao 1834. Aloys Stuppäch

annot.p: S solo and coro (4), A solo and coro (3), T solo and coro (2), B solo and coro (3), cl 1 (3), cl 2 (3), clno 1 (2), clno 2 (2), timp (2), vl 1 (5), vl 2 (5), org (4)

annot.p: S solo and coro (4), A solo and coro (2x; 2, 2), T solo and coro (2), B solo and coro (3), fl (2), cl 1 (2), cl 2 (2), clno 1 (2), clno 2 (2), timp (2), vl 1 (4), vl 2 (4), vlne (3), org (7)
